topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546e787263687279130a0000#post_546e787263687279130a0000
For once I agree.  I have had successful polyamorous relationships before, but that was because everyone was rational level headed adults.  The problem with society seems to be that we raise people fake acting like adults instead of raising to actually behave like adults.

I know I keep using myself as a example, but like a problem a lot of people have is that they use emotions to justify behavior as in "oh I got angry at him so I punched his face"; me on the other hand I can get so mad that I can't see straight and things start blurring, but I would never hit them because I still realize that they're a person and that just cause I'm getting emotional doesn't justify or excuse behavior.

Tl:dr;
Underlying problem with society: "I got emotional therefore I was justified"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
